entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:07 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 9:34 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: WNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
